content: शाब्द {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ब्दी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शब्द-अण्] {@--1@} Relating to or derived from a word. {@--2@} Relating to or depending on sound (<ab>opp.</ab> आर्थ.). {@--3@} Verbal, oral. {@--4@} Sounding, sonorous. {@--5@} Nominal (as inflection). --ब्दः A grammarian. --ब्दी <ab>N.</ab> of Sarasvatī.
